feed.title: Gotify Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gotify: Version 2.5.0
entry.content:
• Add application icons to sidebar (#405 via #602) by @mateuscelio
  • Add listen on unix sockets (#237 via #621) by @LaurenceJJones
  • Log x-forwarded-for in request log (#554 via #624) by @LaurenceJJones
  • Don't disable the refresh button when there are no messages (#636 via #637) by @iarp
  • Show loading animation when loading messages (#658 via #660) by @MexHigh
  • Update backend dependencies (#661)

entry.title: New release for Gotify: Version 2.6.0
entry.content:
• Add HEAD /health endpoint (#687 via #688) by @moinologics
  • Add multiarch support to gotify/server images (#257 via #703) by @eternal-flame-AD
  • server-arm64, server-arm7 and server-riscv64 are deprecated and shouldn't be used anymore.
  • Improve table overflow and word wrapping in UI (#716 via #720) by @david-kalmakoff
  • Fix navigating to a specific site via URL (#721 via #723) by @david-kalmakoff
  • Fix version in UI when accessing via /index.html (#663 via #665)

Internals: * Fix race condition in UI tests (#722) by @eternal-flame-AD * Fix race condition in database tests (#690) by @eternal-flame-AD * Add renovate for automatic dependency updates (#706, and more) by @eternal-flame-AD * Update backend dependencies

entry.title: New release for Gotify: Version 2.6.1
entry.content: Fix crash when setting boolean config value via environment variable https://github.com/gotify/server/issues/731#issuecomment-2479974046 via #734

entry.title: New release for Gotify: Version 2.6.2
entry.content:
• Set umask=0 when creating unix sockets (#741 via #743) by @eternal-flame-AD
  • Update dependencies
